author: stas
msg: new function ModPerl::Util::current_perl_id() which returns something
like (.e.g 0x92ac760) (aTHX) under threaded mpm and 0 under
non-threaded perl (0x0). Useful for debugging modperl under threaded

author: pquerna
msg: * file_io/unix/readwrite.c: Revert to the original code for apr_file writev() in the !HAVE_WRITEV case, and a large comment
explaining why we cannot use a better method without breaking writev()'s semantics.
